title: 48 in. 4 lb. Steel Root Shovel Garden Tool
description: The innovative Root Assassin Garden Tool helps you Garden Easily. The combination Shovel and Saw is a unique new way to slice through tree and plant Roots with ease. The Patented "Teeth" of the Root Assassin let you transplant and clear overgrown areas with just one tool. You can even use the Root Assassin for trimming trees and digging trenches. Root Assassin "Teeth" can be sharpened each season with a standard file or grinder, as needed.
